function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Installation of UVGI without proper maintenance can lead to reduced effectiveness and potential health risks from exposure to UV light.","Impact":"Increased risk of ineffective air sanitation and potential health hazards for inhabitants.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and monitoring of UVGI systems to ensure proper functioning and safe operation.","Technologies":"UVGI systems with built-in monitoring and self-cleaning mechanisms.","People":"Inhabitants of buildings with UVGI systems installed.","Owner":"Building maintenance personnel."},{"Description":"Inadequate research and regulation of air-purifying plants may lead to inconsistent efficacy and potential health risks from plant-related allergens or toxins.","Impact":"Uncertain air purification effectiveness and potential health hazards for occupants due to allergens or toxins from plants.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research and establish standards for air-purifying plants. Monitor indoor air quality and conduct regular assessments of plant performance.","Technologies":"Indoor air quality sensors, phytoremediation research, and air purification standards.","People":"Occupants of buildings with air-purifying plants.","Owner":"Building managers or environmental health experts."},{"Description":"Inconsistent implementation and maintenance of vertical greening systems may result in reduced air purification efficiency and potential structural damage to buildings.","Impact":"Decreased air purification effectiveness and potential structural damage to buildings due to improper installation or maintenance.","Mitigation":"Develop and implement guidelines for consistent installation and maintenance of vertical greening systems. Conduct regular inspections of system integrity and plant health.","Technologies":"Structural monitoring systems, plant health monitoring technology, and green building guidelines.","People":"Occupants of buildings with vertical greening systems.","Owner":"Building maintenance and green building professionals."}]}
